content.html: There's a video of a guy who recorded audio of dogs playing and brought it to the pound, where staff was struggling to help depressed shelter dogs cope. As soon as they played the recording, the dogs perked up, started engaging and eating again ðŸ˜­ It was a *laugh track* for them!
